arguments.summary: read one or more arguments files and add them to the command line
arguments.name: --arguments_file

arguments.summary: Extract the data sources to a sibling folder after they have been downloaded.
arguments.name: --extract-after-download

arguments.summary: A configuration file to use with the GATK.
arguments.name: --gatk-config-file

arguments.summary: If the GCS bucket channel errors out, how many times it will attempt to re-initiate the connection
arguments.name: --gcs-max-retries

arguments.summary: Project to bill when accessing "requester pays" buckets. If unset, these buckets cannot be accessed.  User must have storage.buckets.get permission on the bucket being accessed.
arguments.name: --gcs-project-for-requester-pays

arguments.summary: Download the latest pre-packaged datasources for germline functional annotation.
arguments.name: --germline

arguments.summary: Output location for the data sources.
arguments.name: --output

arguments.summary: Overwrite output file if it exists already.
arguments.name: --overwrite-output-file

arguments.summary: Whether to suppress job-summary info on System.err.
arguments.name: --QUIET

arguments.summary: Download the latest pre-packaged datasources for somatic functional annotation.
arguments.name: --somatic

arguments.summary: Whether to use the JdkDeflater (as opposed to IntelDeflater)
arguments.name: --use-jdk-deflater

arguments.summary: Whether to use the JdkInflater (as opposed to IntelInflater)
arguments.name: --use-jdk-inflater

arguments.summary: Validate the integrity of the data sources after downloading them using sha256.
arguments.name: --validate-integrity

arguments.summary: display the version number for this tool
arguments.name: --version

description:
FuncotatorDataSourceDownloader is a tool to download the latest data sources for Funcotator.

General Information

This tool can download pre-packaged data sources for both the somatic and germline use cases. The data sources downloaded by this tool correspond to the latest / current maximum of the data sources supported as defined in org.broadinstitute.hellbender.tools.funcotator.dataSources.DataSourceUtils#CURRENT_MAXIMUM_DATA_SOURCE_VERSION.

To download and extract the data sources, you can invoke FuncotatorDataSourceDownloader in the following ways:

  • For somatic data sources:
     ./gatk FuncotatorDataSourceDownloader --somatic --validate-integrity --extract-after-download
  • For germline data sources:
     ./gatk FuncotatorDataSourceDownloader --germline --validate-integrity --extract-after-download

Notes

  • By default FuncotatorDataSourceDownloader will not overwrite data sources if they already exist locally.
  • It is recommended to run the validation step after downloading the data sources to ensure download integrity.
  • Using this tool will result in longer download times for data sources than if gsutil were invoked directly to copy down the data sources.
    This is a known issue and is due to the tool printing the progress of the download.
name: FuncotatorDataSourceDownloader
